org.anarres.cpp

Class FileLexerSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.anarres.cpp.Source
      • org.anarres.cpp.LexerSource
        • org.anarres.cpp.InputLexerSource
          • org.anarres.cpp.FileLexerSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Iterable<Token>

    public class FileLexerSource
extends InputLexerSource
    A Source which lexes a file. The input is buffered.
    See Also:
    Source
